name: Riya Singh
comment: I enjoyed a lot and learnt some valuable things which will help me in the future.I want to say a big Thanks to all the co-ordinators of this workshop for providing us this kind of programs and helping us in developing our knowledge in C++ language.

comment: I would like to thank the whole team of uniques for such kind of learning education and content of coding & wonderful memories of crusade uniques for 1 week like immense pleasure to being a part of it.

comment: I had a fantastic experience and gained valuable insights that will undoubtedly benefit me in the future. I extend my heartfelt gratitude to all the workshop coordinators for organizing such enriching programs and guiding us in enhancing our proficiency in the C++ language.
